_PAGE_MIGRATION_1_TO_2_RENAME_AMENU_DESC:
• The AMenu2 component has been renamed to AMenu
  • All CSS classes have been renamed:
    • .a_menu_2 → .a_menu.
    • CSS variables: --a_menu_2_ → --a_menu_.
The component is now imported as follows:
_PAGE_MIGRATION_1_TO_2_RENAME_TINYMCE_DE: • The TinyMCE component is no longer supported due to the license change of TinyMCE from MIT to GPL-2.0-or-later.
_PAGE_MIGRATION_1_TO_2_STYLES_REMOVE_DES: • The .a_columns_gab_ styles have been removed (typo). Use .a_columns_gap_ instead.
_PAGE_MIGRATION_1_TO_2_STYLES_ALOHA_CSS_:
• The styles from aloha-css are now integrated into aloha-vue.
  • aloha-css is deprecated and will be removed in the near future.
It is recommended to include styles as follows:
_PAGE_MIGRATION_1_TO_2_IMPORTS_DESCRIPTI: All entities, such as components, directives, plugins, functions, and translations, can now be imported directly:
_PAGE_MIGRATION_1_TO_2_DEPENDENCY_DESCRI: Check for updates in your project to meet the new requirements.
